title: Lux Skin Idea
body:
PLEASE MAKE THIS HAPPEN RITO.
Seriously Riot, Lux needs a non-military, princess related skin. She does. It's been like 2 years. Steel Legion didn't fit her at ALL. To be honest? Only sorceress and crownguard really do..

I have an idea for a new lux skin idea. Astral Princess Lux.
She has platinum blonde hair with a silver, blue diamond and rose quartz encrusted tiara. Her hair is a large braid put to the left side with a sideswept fringe with a long strand of hair from the other side hanging out. She has white, silver glowing elbow length gloves. She wears a royal blue dress (LINK ABOVE : http://www.sammydress.cc/ball-gown-strapless-ruched-embroidery-satin-long-royal-blue-quinceanera-dress_945.html  minus the gloves.) With matching royal blue and silver heels. Her wand looks like: http://parlourtricks.deviantart.com/art/Golden-Star-s-Star-Wand-143279353 
This skin is Legendary, priced at 1820 RP.
Her recall animation ideas are;
She walks into a beautiful grove, then stars and comets shoot across the skies. Lux basically fangirls over it.
Second idea: She walks into her room being shoved by her maids, they put her in front of a mirror to put makeup on her.
Third Idea: Lux tries to cast a perfect spell with a spell book and wand. The spell backfires, with a supernova. 
Death Animation:
Lux falls to the ground, an astral portal opens up and swallows her into the galaxy. 
Her auto attack animation is a blue star comet. With silvery light behind trailing it. It explodes on impact.
Her passive animation is a a crescent moon outline. Then explodes with light on impact like normally.
Light Binding:
It looks like a blue dashing ray of light with stars and moons. When it hits an enemy/enemies, it looks like morgana's prison. But on the bottom of the target, a moving star is there. Thin watery astral lines accompnay the prison.
Lucent SIngularity:
She throws a star levitating with small moons sorrounding it. It spins like a globe and then explodes. with light.
Prismatic Barrier:
Lux throws her wand, the shield looks like a a giant star. An opaque giant star.
Final Spark:
Final Spark looks like a dozen crescent moons in a line with a silvery light dashing through each one. They all explode, with stars. 
When she casts it, she says: The stars align.
Dance: Lux dances with a prince. *Prince appears out of nowhere*
Laugh: Lux Laughs.
Taunt: MY POWER. WILL DOMINATE. 
Energy of the moon, sun and stars! Is MORE than enough to defeat you!
My magic is stronger. How strong? Stronger than yours.
Walking: There is always light in the darkness.
Astral ENERGY! It's so fun!
My power is Awesome!
Joke: Astral Power, is like the best! It's SO much fun!
Astral is like, the new thing.
My magic failed?! *says while casting a spell* Uhh.. Haha? Oh look over there! *fades into the shadows*
Sailer moon? That thing was like inspired by me.
Also includes a chibi lux summoner icon
